movies.title: Reunion
movies.plot: Live footage from concentration camps after the liberation, and the complex transport and lodging of masses of prisoners of war and other deported people back to their home countries, at the end of World War II.
movies.simplePlot: Live footage from concentration camps after the liberation, and the complex transport and lodging of masses of prisoners of war and other deported people back to their home countries, at the end of World War II.

biography.bio: Claude Roy was born on August 26, 1915 in Paris, France as Claude Orland. He was a writer and actor, known for Picasso (1955), Le sourire (1960) and Entrez dans la danse (1952). He was married to Loleh Bellon. He died on December 13, 1997 in Paris.
biography.name: Claude Roy

runtime: 22 min (Buenos Aires Festival Internacional de Cine Independiente) (Argentina)

companyCreditsSimple.name: Ministère des Prisonniers de Guerre et des Déportés
